Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description: We are looking for a Junior Data Scientist with strong skills in Python, machine learning, statistics, SQL, data visualization, and cloud platforms.

Title: Software Engineer (.NET)
Description: Responsibilities: design and develop software using C#, .NET, OOP, design patterns, REST APIs, and SQL Server. Experience with Agile and version control (Git) is required.

Title: Data Analyst
Description: Analyze datasets using SQL, Power BI or Tableau, statistics and hypothesis testing. Experience with data warehousing and ETL is a plus.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description: Build ML models in Python, use deep learning frameworks, deploy models as APIs, work with big data tools and cloud platforms.
